title: Randumhouse
content:
Hi everyone, this is my first post here, so I hope this question is appropriate.

I am after a PC version of the font Randumhouse...I have found it for sale here:

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&category=&id=14#14](http://web.archive.org/web/20090802163607/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&category=&id=14#14 "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&category=&id=14#14")

but don’t really want to purchase the entire collection; I really just need this one font. Does anyone know of anywhere else I can find it?

Thanks in advance

Jared
author: musicguy

comments.content: To best of my knowledge, House only sells their fonts as part of a particular collection, not individually, so it’s unlikely you’ll find Randumhouse anywhere else. Try contacting them to see if they’ll strike a deal — what have you got to lose?

Thanks for your advice Marcox...I got this reply from House:

Jared,

Yes, we sell our single font for $100 each. To place the order, please call us.

Thanks,  
lou

....so there you go! Now I just hope they ship electronically and we’re set :)

Cheers

Jared
At that price, you may as well go for the whole collection. :)

Jared,  
Have you also considered [FontDiner](http://web.archive.org/web/20090802163607/http:/www.fontdiner.com/main.html) fonts? Some of them have a similar feel and they have a bunch of free ones.
